title: Don't think I've ever been able to do this...
body:
Apparently you can cancel Aatrox's passive heal early...but I've always been immobile for the full duration even when I spam click move...

{{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}}

replies.body: Doesn't matter if I build Hydra on Aatrox or not...it's happened ever since he's been released for me anyway...

Nothing to do with Hydra...it's whenever I play Aatrox...

{{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}}
No what i'm saying is that a lot of people have animation cancels that are done by Hydra (Renketon W, Riven W) and this is probably one of them.
It's probably one of the hydra cancels.
